definition.name: Azure Blob storage Tool
definition.description: Update ExpiresAt of a blob in Azure Blob storage
definition.author: Bo-Yi Wu

inputs.name: account_name
inputs.description: Account name of Azure Blob storage

inputs.name: account_key
inputs.description: Account key of Azure Blob storage

inputs.name: container_name
inputs.description: Container name of Azure Blob storage

inputs.name: blob_name
inputs.description: Blob name of Azure Blob storage

outputs.name: expire_at_unix
outputs.description: ExpiresAt of the blob in Unix timestamp

evidence.reasoning: This action interacts with Azure Blob storage, which is primarily an infrastructure service for storing data. It also involves deployment aspects as it updates the expiration of blobs, which can be part of a deployment strategy.
